item.description:
Do you know how to look a property up and down and estimate the repair costs? Are you using a system to interview and pre-screen your contractors? Would you like to try something different and start Rehabbing for Profit?

For our May Turning the Key meeting, Paul Esajian, star of A&E's "Flip This House", has agreed to join us and speak about his own experiences workign with contractors. He'll be sharing with us the systems that he successfully uses for Rehabbing for HUGE Profits! - in today's market!.

These techniques have worked fantastically for Paul; he's used the rehabbing systems that he'll be speaking about to build a multi-million dollar real estate business in three years, during which time he has purchased over 200 homes for prices substantially below market value.


Register today and reserve your seat for the April 3rd Turning the Key! For more information or to register you can visit our website at ForeclosuresMass.com or call us at 617-275-4800.

Register early and get $10 off admission price!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Turning the Key: Rehabbing for HUGE Profits in Today's Market!
